name: ip-tools
title: IP Tools
description: This is an extension plugin for converting, validating, and calculating IP subnets. (net, mask, netmask, ip2long, long2ip, cidr, ipv4, ipv6 & geoLocation)
author: meguoe

commands.name: ip2long
commands.title: Convert IP Address to Number
commands.description: Convert IPv4 or IPv6 Address to Number

commands.name: long2ip
commands.title: Convert Number to IP Address
commands.description: Convert Number to IPv4 or IPv6

commands.name: ip2BinHex
commands.title: Convert IP Address to Bin and Hex
commands.description: Convert IPv4 or IPv6 Address to binary and hexadecimal

commands.name: parseCIDR
commands.title: Convert CIDR to IP Range
commands.description: Convert CIDR to IPv4 or IPv6 Range

commands.name: isValidIP
commands.title: Verify IP Address Is Valid
commands.description: Verify if the IP address Is valid

commands.name: isValidCIDR
commands.title: Verify CIDR Is Valid
commands.description: Verify if the CIDR is valid

commands.name: toIPv6Format
commands.title: Converts IPv4 to IPv6 Address
commands.description: Converts IPv4 address to IPv6 address

commands.name: toIPv6Expand
commands.title: Converts IPv6 to Expanded or Compressed
commands.description: Converts IPv6 to expanded or compressed format

commands.name: geoLocation
commands.title: Query IP Geolocation Information
commands.description: Query IPv4 or Ipv6 Geolocation Information
